:::Herald, Defection and DataStreak Teleport to the battle They were to 
drained to fight. They spotted Hot Rod and Herald Spoke to Him:::

Herald: " Rodimus, we have the matrix for you."

:::He eyed Primal. he saw uncertainty in him the truth behind Primal was in 
turmoil. Herald had no trust for this bot. He handed the matrix to Hot Rod:::

Herald: "here it is, but I don't trust Primal, Remember that I am the keeper 
of Truth. Watch him and don't leave him alone with the matrix, keep the 
Matrix with you in you chest panel. These are my words of wisdom to you, We 
will be in the CR chambers if you need us. Thank you!"

:::The tree of them walked to the Cybertronian Fire and settled down in  CR 
Chambers:::
